alert.delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This will immediately remove all your data and preferences from this device and sign you out.
alert.delete.title: Delete Account

calories.added.title: Sport Calories Added
calories.invalid.msg: Please enter a valid number of calories burned.
calories.invalid.title: Invalid Calories
camera.unavailable.msg: Your device does not have a camera.
camera.unavailable.title: Camera Unavailable
disc.accuracy.text: Nutritional estimates are based on visual analysis and may not be completely accurate. Actual nutritional content may vary based on preparation methods, portion sizes, and ingredient variations.
disc.feature.calories: • Calorie Tracking: Estimates based on visual food analysis
disc.feature.limits: • Calorie Limits: Default values or personalized calculations based on health data
disc.feature.macros: • Nutritional Analysis: Macronutrient breakdown using AI image recognition
disc.feature.plans: • Personalized Plans: Optional BMR-based calorie recommendations using user health data
disc.feature.recommendations: • Dietary Recommendations: General suggestions based on nutritional guidelines
disc.feature.weight: • Weight Tracking: User-input data for personal monitoring
disc.medical.text: Always consult with a qualified healthcare provider before making any changes to your diet or nutrition plan, especially if you have medical conditions, allergies, or dietary restrictions.
disc.notice.text: This app provides general nutritional information and dietary suggestions for educational purposes only. The information is not intended to replace professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment.
disc.title: Health Information Disclaimer
feedback.field.label: Your Feedback
feedback.placeholder: Tell us what you think about the app, any issues you've encountered, or features you'd like to see...
feedback.subtitle: Help us improve your experience
feedback.title: Share Your Feedback

friends.add.fail.title: Failed
friends.add.success.title: You have a new friend!
fs.hint: Double tap to reset • Pinch to zoom • Drag to pan

health.plan.title: Your Plan

library.unavailable.title: Photo Library Unavailable
login.subtitle: Piesakieties, lai turpinātu
notif.title: Eateria Reminder
onboarding.datamode.desc: Pick how much detail you want to see. You can change this later in your profile.
onboarding.datamode.title: Choose Your Data Mode 📈
onboarding.language.desc: Izvēlieties savu vēlamo valodu. Vēlāk to var mainīt apmācībā.
onboarding.language.title: Izvēlieties valodu 🌐
onboarding.notifications.desc: Enable reminders to snap your meals: breakfast (by 12), lunch (by 17), and dinner (by 21). We'll only remind you if you haven't snapped food yet. You can change this later in settings.
onboarding.notifications.title: Stay on Track with Gentle Reminders ⏰
onboarding.skip.title: Izlaist iepazīšanos?
onboarding.skip.message: Šo apmācību vienmēr varat piekļūt vēlāk no sava profila iestatījumiem.
onboarding.welcome.title: Laipni lūdzam Eateria! 🍎
onboarding.welcome.desc: Jūsu gudrais pārtikas palīgs: sekojiet kalorijām, svaram un izvēlieties veselīgāk. Apskatīsim īsu tūri!
onboarding.recognition.title: Gudra ēdiena atpazīšana 📸
onboarding.recognition.desc: Nofočējiet ēdienu — MI automātiski atpazīst un reģistrē kalorijas.
onboarding.tracking.title: Seko līdzi progresam 📊
onboarding.tracking.desc: Dienas kalorijas un svars — viss automatizēts!
onboarding.alcohol.title: Alkohola uzskaite 🍷
onboarding.alcohol.desc: Apskati vēsturi kalendārā; glāzes krāsa rāda aktualitāti.
onboarding.friends.title: Dalies ar ēdieniem ar draugiem 🤝
onboarding.friends.desc: Pievieno draugus un dalies no saraksta; izvēlies daļu.
onboarding.insights.title: Personalizēti ieskati 💡
onboarding.insights.desc: Tendences, profils un veselības info — jūsu mērķiem.
onboarding.health_setup.title: Personalizēta veselības iestatīšana 📋
onboarding.health_setup.desc: Kaloriju ieteikumi pēc jūsu datiem (pēc izvēles).
onboarding.health_form.title: Jūsu veselības dati 📝
onboarding.health_results.title: Jūsu personalizētais plāns 🎯
onboarding.health_results.desc: Pamatojoties uz datiem — ieteikumi optimālai veselībai.
onboarding.disclaimer.title: Svarīgs veselības paziņojums ⚠️
onboarding.disclaimer.desc: Lietotne neaizstāj ārsta padomu. Konsultējieties ar speciālistu.
onboarding.complete.title: Viss gatavs! 🎉
onboarding.complete.desc: Gatavs sākt? Pamācību var atvērt iestatījumos jebkurā laikā.
